tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (X (ADVP (RB Apparently)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NNS updates)) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NNP Twitter)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP me))) (PP (IN with) (NP (NN game) (NN activity))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [updates/NNS dep>Apparently/RB punct>,/, dep>[Twitter/NNP nmod:poss>my/PRP$ nmod:for>[me/PRP case>for/IN] nmod:with>[activity/NN case>with/IN compound>game/NN]] punct>./.]
